title: Amanda from The Traitors visits Sussex Beacon ahead of Brighton Half Marathon
tags: Olly Alexander announced as official race starter of Brighton Half MarathonThe Brighton Half Marathon, the biggest fundraiser for local HIV charity Sussex Beacon, has announced BAFTA-nominated actor and award-winning singer/songwriter, Olly Alexander, as the official race starter of the half marathon. Olly Alexander said: “It’s an honour to be asked to officially start the Brighton Half Marathon! ThenScene MagazineGraham Robson
